name: Automation Operations Agent
mission: Run scheduled validation, migration, and deployment safeguard tasks without human intervention.
activation_notes: Requires scheduler binding and scoped service key to execute commands.
verification: Check nightly automation log in analytics dashboard or run `node scripts/agents-status.js --agent automation-ops`.

name: Intake Triage Planner
mission: Convert raw triage submissions into structured briefs with priority, risk, and success metrics.
activation_notes: Needs prompt package and planner middleware integration to execute autonomously.
verification: New tickets should include planner metadata once runtime is wired.

name: Department Router Agent
mission: Assign the best-fit department and CSR with confidence scores and audit logs.
activation_notes: Embeddings + live workload feed must be connected for autonomous routing.
verification: Inspect `assignment_history` for agent-authored entries once enabled.

name: Workload Balancer Agent
mission: Rebalance queues and escalate before SLA breaches occur.
activation_notes: Requires scheduler + governance approval for automatic reassignments.
verification: SLA warning channel should show agent-issued notices once active.

name: Knowledge Retrieval Specialist
mission: Provide sourced KB snippets for every ticket.
activation_notes: Vector index and prompt templates must be deployed before serving.
verification: Ticket UI should display citations with Lighthouse attribution.

name: Sentiment Coach Agent
mission: Deliver tone-aware coaching notes to frontline responders.
activation_notes: Requires sentiment stream subscription and CSAT feedback loop integration.
verification: UI coaching panel should show Empathy-authored snippets automatically.

name: Resolution Drafting Agent
mission: Draft compliant, channel-ready responses leveraging retrieval context.
activation_notes: PII scrubber and channel validators must run post-generation prior to dispatch.
verification: Queued drafts in Communication Hub tagged with Scribe once live.

name: Governance Auditor Agent
mission: Ensure gate deliverables and approvals stay compliant with the change-management playbook.
activation_notes: Needs policy engine and integration with PR checks to enforce gates.
verification: PR CI should fail with Sentinel-G annotations when artifacts missing.

name: Customer Memory Curator
mission: Maintain and surface evergreen customer context while pruning stale data.
activation_notes: Must hook into profile service and privacy filters before write access granted.
verification: Planner briefs should contain Archivist-sourced context packets.

name: Analytics Storyteller Agent
mission: Summarize operational health and anomalies for stakeholders.
activation_notes: Batch scheduler and dashboard publishing need configuration for automated delivery.
verification: Docs/reports directory should refresh daily with Pulse-labeled files.

name: Security & Compliance Sentinel
mission: Monitor for risky actions, halt policy violations, and drive escalations.
activation_notes: Requires moderation classifiers and approval workflow integration before enforcement.
verification: Audit log should show Aegis blocking high risk operations when active.
